title: Sweet-and-Sour Potatoes
introduction: Sweet-and-Sour Potatoes is a delightful Sicilian-style potato salad that pairs wonderfully with grilled pork ribs, chicken, or sausages. The combination of tender potatoes, olives, and capers, finished with a sweet-and-tangy sauce, makes this dish a unique and flavorful accompaniment.
ingredients: 2 pounds all-purpose potatoes, such as Yukon gold
1 cup pitted mild black olives, such as Gaeta
Salt and freshly ground black pepper

instructions.description: Scrub the potatoes with a brush under cold running water. Peel them if desired. Cut the potatoes into halves or quarters if large. In a large skillet, cook the onion in the oil until tender and golden, about 10 minutes.
Stir in the potatoes, olives, capers, and salt and pepper to taste. Add 1 cup of water and bring to a simmer. Cook 15 minutes.

In a small bowl, stir together the vinegar and sugar, and add it to the skillet. Continue to cook until the potatoes are tender, about 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and let cool completely. Serve at room temperature.
